目.definition: eye; (literary) to look; to regard; eye (of a net); mesh; mesh size; grit size (abbr. for 目數|目数[mu4 shu4]); item; section; list; catalogue; (taxonomy) order; name; title

目下十行.definition: see 一目十行[yi1 mu4 shi2 hang2]

目不交睫.definition: lit. the eyelashes do not come together (idiom); fig. to not sleep a wink

目不忍見.definition: see 目不忍視|目不忍视[mu4 bu4 ren3 shi4]

目不忍視.definition: lit. the eye cannot bear to see it (idiom); fig. pitiful to behold

目不斜視.definition: not to glance sideways (idiom); to gaze fixedly; to be fully concentrated; to preserve a correct attitude

目不暇接.definition: lit. too much for the eye to take in (idiom); a feast for the eyes

目不暇給.definition: lit. the eye cannot take it all in (idiom); fig. too many good things to see; a feast for the eyes

目不窺園.definition: lit. not even peek at the garden; fig. to be absorbed in one's studies (idiom)

目不見睫.definition: lit. the eye cannot see the eyelashes (idiom); fig. unable to see one's own faults; to lack self-awareness; truths too close to home

目不識丁.definition: lit. the eye cannot recognize the letter T (idiom); totally illiterate

目不轉睛.definition: unable to take one's eyes off (idiom); to gaze steadily; to stare

目中無人.definition: to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters; condescending; to go about with one's nose in the air

目今.definition: nowadays; at present; as things stand

目光.definition: gaze; (fig.) attention; expression in one's eyes; look; (lit. and fig.) sight; vision

目光呆滯.definition: to have a lifeless look in one's eyes (idiom)

目光所及.definition: as far as the eye can see

目怔口呆.definition: lit. eye startled, mouth struck dumb (idiom); stunned; stupefied

目愴有天.definition: to look at the sky in sorrow

目成.definition: to make eyes; to exchange flirting glances with sb

目挑心招.definition: the eye incites, the heart invites (idiom); flirtatious; making eyes at sb

目擊.definition: to see with one's own eyes; to witness

目標匹配作業.pinyin: mu4 biao1 pi3 pei4 zuo4 ye4

目測.definition: to estimate visually; to gauge; visual assessment

目無全牛.definition: to see the ox already cut up into joints (idiom); extremely skilled; able to see through the problem at one glance

目無法紀.definition: with no regard for law or discipline (idiom); flouting the law and disregarding all rules; in complete disorder

目無組織.definition: to pay no heed to the regulations

目的.definition: purpose; aim; goal; target; objective; CL:個|个[ge4]

目眩頭昏.definition: to be dizzy and see stars

目睹.definition: to witness; to see at first hand; to see with one's own eyes

目空一切.definition: the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant; condescending; supercilious

目空四海.definition: the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant; condescending; supercilious

目視.definition: to look at; to visually observe (i.e. not using instruments or sensors)

目迷五色.definition: the eye is bewildered by five colors (idiom); a dazzling riot of colors

目送.definition: to follow with one's eyes (a departing guest etc)

目錄.definition: catalog; table of contents; directory (on computer hard drive); list; contents
